tooltip.sscprimitivetools.sharpened_rock: §7Can be used to shape flint & ores for crafting crude tools.
tooltip.sscprimitivetools.random_crude_s: §7The rock is jagged and misshapen, and you lack the means to shape it. The tool you create will be random.
tooltip.sscprimitivetools.random_flint_t: §7The flint is jagged and misshapen, and you lack the means to shape it. The tool you create will be random.
tooltip.sscprimitivetools.wide_shaped_fl: §7Flint beaten into shape. Would make a decent shovel.
tooltip.sscprimitivetools.fanned_shaped_: §7Flint beaten into shape. Would make a decent axe.
tooltip.sscprimitivetools.long_shaped_fl: §7Flint beaten into shape. Would make a decent pickaxe.
tooltip.sscprimitivetools.thin_shaped_fl: §7Flint beaten into shape. Would make a decent hoe.
tooltip.sscprimitivetools.random_crude_g: §7The gold is jagged and misshapen, and you lack the means to shape it. The tool you create will be random.
tooltip.sscprimitivetools.wide_shaped_go: §7Gold beaten into shape. Would make a decent shovel.
tooltip.sscprimitivetools.fanned_shaped_: §7Gold beaten into shape. Would make a decent axe.
tooltip.sscprimitivetools.long_shaped_go: §7Gold beaten into shape. Would make a decent pickaxe.
tooltip.sscprimitivetools.jagged_shaped_: §7Raw gold beaten into shape. Would make a decent knife.
tooltip.sscprimitivetools.thin_shaped_go: §7Gold beaten into shape. Would make a decent hoe.
tooltip.sscprimitivetools.random_crude_c: §7The copper is jagged and misshapen, and you lack the means to shape it. The tool you create will be random.
tooltip.sscprimitivetools.wide_shaped_co: §7Raw copper beaten into shape. Would make a decent shovel.
tooltip.sscprimitivetools.fanned_shaped_: §7Raw copper beaten into shape. Would make a decent axe.
tooltip.sscprimitivetools.long_shaped_co: §7Raw copper beaten into shape. Would make a decent pickaxe.
tooltip.sscprimitivetools.jagged_shaped_: §7Raw copper beaten into shape. Would make a decent knife.
tooltip.sscprimitivetools.thin_shaped_co: §7Raw copper beaten into shape. Would make a decent hoe.
tooltip.sscprimitivetools.random_crude_i: §7The iron is jagged and misshapen, and you lack the means to shape it. The tool you create will be random.
tooltip.sscprimitivetools.wide_shaped_ir: §7Raw iron beaten into shape. Would make a decent shovel.
tooltip.sscprimitivetools.fanned_shaped_: §7Raw iron beaten into shape. Would make a decent axe.
tooltip.sscprimitivetools.long_shaped_ir: §7Raw iron beaten into shape. Would make a decent pickaxe.
tooltip.sscprimitivetools.jagged_shaped_: §7Raw iron beaten into shape. Would make a decent knife.
